title: Homely
summary: Homely is an innovative platform that enables travelers, whether for tourism or temporary accommodation, to easily find the perfect place to meet their needs. Through an advanced search system and smart filters, users can explore a wide range of properties, compare available options, and manage their bookings seamlessly. The platform also provides property owners with an integrated space to add and manage their properties, allowing them to track bookings and manage their profiles flexibly and efficiently.

title: PegasusE-commerce
summary: Pegasus Ecommerce is a modern web-based platform that allows users to browse and purchase products with a seamless user experience. The site includes features like product filtering, sorting, and a streamlined checkout process to ensure an optimal shopping experience. The project integrates robust technologies to create a scalable and user-friendly interface.
features: Product browsing with filters and sorting
Integration with a real-time database to manage product listings and user orders

title: PegasusDashboard
summary: Pegasus Dashboard is an admin panel designed for managing products and sales in an ecommerce platform. It allows admins to add, edit, and delete products, as well as track sales performance through interactive charts. The dashboard provides an intuitive interface for monitoring key business metrics and managing product inventories.
features: Sales tracking with real-time data visualization

title: BuildHub
summary: Build Hub is a landing page for an integrated engineering office that aims to showcase engineering projects and services in a professional and modern manner. The platform provides a comprehensive overview of the latest completed projects, highlighting details of the designs and services provided, helping clients explore the quality and expertise of the office. The platform also facilitates easy communication with the engineering team and inquiries about various services, making it an ideal tool for clients seeking integrated engineering solutions characterized by creativity and efficiency.
